/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, their glass and concrete facades reflecting the clear blue sky. The trees lining the street add a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
